description: In an exquisite career overhaul, former Green Beret, John Paulus, fulfills his porn dreams when Wilson Vasquez breaks him in. Green Berets are stone-cold bad-asses, which makes these scene so hot: when power-top flips around John and slides in and out of his ass and pounds out his hole, it gives new meaning to what goes on behind bedroom doors! It’s the ultimate fantasy fulfillment!
title: Wilson Vasquez Pounds Out John Paulus' Hole
